comments:
Using build TPTP-4.2.0-200603020100, the following NPE is thrown after you enter the name of the test to be recorded and before the RecorderControlView is displayed and the browser is brought up.  This only happens with a new workspace and the first time you try a recording (which automatically displays the RecorderControlView).

To reproduce, start Eclipse with "eclipse -consolelog" from DOS command line. Use a new workspace.  When Eclipse comes up, load the Test Perspective.  Right-click in the Test Navigator, then New->Test Element->Test From Recording, then Next. Select 'Create test from new recording, highlight 'HTTP Recording', then Next. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.ui 1 0 2006-03-02 13:36:21.593
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException

Fix in hand.
It will be delivered as soon as the CVS head is open for 4.2i2.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
